text: The Joint European Torus, or JET, was a magnetically confined plasma physics experiment. It is at Culham Centre for Fusion Energy in Oxfordshire, United Kingdom. It ran between 1983 and 2023. Between 2009 and 2011, JET was shut down to rebuild many of its parts. On 21 December 2021, JET produced 59 megajoules during a five-second pulse, beating its last 1997 record of 21.7 megajoules. ==References== Category:February 2022 events Category:December 2021 events Category:Physics experiments Category:2021 in the United Kingdom Category:Oxfordshire Category:2022 in the United Kingdom
title: Joint European Torus
